text: Mbe Zisas ndim, khanarareŋ ga ntorgim, mba raar ra vov phɨɨŋ ndim, ran ŋaar vhɨzgi. Ran ŋaar vhɨzgim, maaŋ gɨngiap, za kha nuiana vharigi. Mba maaŋ gɨngiap, mbara muuŋgiap kim, ra vera vov ŋkotugun phuni khegene ndigi. Maaŋ gɨngim, mbe mba Fhe Bakɨmen Phena vhee ntorgi shaa bakɨme, ana rɨgɨra shɨragerɨgap, fɨga mpuani ga gegi.
